An elder cadantine potion (unf) is a quest item in Song of the Elves made by using an elder cadantine on a vial of water. The player must then use crystal dust on this unfinished potion to make an inversion potion.

[[File:Elder cadantine potion (unf) detail.png|100px|left]]
An '''elder cadantine potion (unf)''' is a quest item in [[Song of the Elves]] made by using an [[elder cadantine]] on a [[vial of water]]. The player must then use [[crystal dust]] on this unfinished potion to make an [[inversion potion]].
